text: Frank Zacharias Robin Goldsmith, Baron Goldsmith of Richmond Park (born 20 January 1975) is a British politician and journalist who currently has the role as Minister of State for Pacific and the Environment. He served as Member of Parliament for Richmond Park after being elected in the 2010 general election until 2016 and from 2017http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CBP-7979/CBP-7979.pdf until 2019 . He also was the Conservative candidate in the 2016 London mayoral election, which he lost to Sadiq Khan from Labour. He is also a member of the Goldsmith family. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:People educated at Eton College Category:British Jews Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:Politicians from London Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
title: Zac Goldsmith
